name: Exit 13 Gallery Escape
description:
Exit 13 Gallery Escape is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in a gallery on the 13th floor of a building. Your only hope is to find the exit and reach the 1st floor, but every time you do, you end up in the same gallery again and again. What is going on? Who is behind this nightmare? And can you escape before you lose your sanity?

Play Time:
20 - 120 minutes

In this game, you will experience a terrifying journey through a twisted art gallery, where nothing is as it seems. You will have to explore the gallery, solve puzzles, and avoid dangers, while trying to uncover the truth behind this mysterious loop.

The game features:
  • A suspenseful and immersive gameplay, where you will feel the tension and fear of being trapped in a gallery that never ends.
  • A light and minimalistic setting, with cinematic graphics and sound effects that will create a contrast with the horror.
  • A challenging and unpredictable experience, where you will face different threats and scenarios each time you play.

Exit 13 Gallery Escape is a game that will test your nerves, your mind, and your will to survive. Are you ready to enter the gallery?
